Description: Fernandes Vertigo in very good used condition. This is one unusual looking guitar but it has quickly grown on me, but I think I am going to get one of the Elite models with a Floyd Rose and neck-thru construction. Visually, it reminds me of a stylized Gibson Thunderbird. With its tune-o-matic bridge set up and clear, high-output factory humbucker pickups, the tone is more reminiscent of a Gibson SG. It does very well through a Mesa Boogie Dual Rectifier fwiw !) This guitar has a nice feel and a very solid weight. The body is mahogany and the neck is maple with a rosewood fretboard. There are some dings and pick scratches on the top that are hard to see in these photos. The tuners are very stable & the frets have at least 90% of their life left. The fit and finish of Fernandes guitars continues to impress me in every way. If you haven’t played one lately, you should really check them out. You will not be disappointed with this one. - Sixstringspaceboy All original / unmodified. No case included. Flat rate shipping to lower 48 United States only. Will be professionally packed and insured appropriately. ( from Fernandes’ website ) “The Vertigo X features a solid Alder body and bolt-on hard Maple neck with a Rosewood 22-fret fingerboard, equipped with dual high output humbuckers for powerful tone at an affordable price. Available in Black, Dark Green Metallic Satin, and Snow White finishes. VERTIGO X : Body: Alder Neck: Maple, Bolt On Fingerboard: Rosewood, 24 3/4" Scale, 22 Jumbo Frets, 16" Radius, Center Dot Inlays Nut: Composite 1 5/8" Tuning Gears: Die Cast Bridge: Tune-O-Matic W/Stop Tailpiece Controls: 3-Way Toggle Switch, 1 Volume, 1 Tone Pickups: Neck : High Output Humbucker, Bridge : High Output Humbucker Colors: Black, Snow White, Dark Green Metallic Satin Artists
Title: Fernandes -Vertigo X - 6 String - Electric Guitar- Black
